channel.title: [637/639] Boolean Question
channel.description: I have made it where after a certain dialogue, a boolean is changed to be true. [code] case 10043: player.TalkedtoAR = true; return false;[/code] However, after a player logs out the boolean is reset back to false. How can I make it where the boolean stays true permanently, regardless of logging out, unless changed by another command?

item.title: [637/639] Boolean Question
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

I really know nothing about the 600+ revisions, but look for a file named “PlayerSave” or something along those lives, and with a lot of servers, adding a new variable to be saved is pretty straightforward

Read full topic

item.title: [637/639] Boolean Question

I have made it where after a certain dialogue, a boolean is changed to be true.

case 10043: player.TalkedtoAR = true; return false;
However, after a player logs out the boolean is reset back to false.
How can I make it where the boolean stays true permanently, regardless of logging out, unless changed by another command?
